initial_input: Write a 4-chapter sci-fi story for adults about a rogue AI on Mars that develops a sense of humor. The mood should be dark but witty.

agents.description: Parses user message into structured content parameters.

tool_config.instructions: The user wants to write a story. Extract the title, topic, mood, and number of chapters from their request.

agents.prompt_template: The story is about '{topic}' with a '{mood}' mood. Generate a creative, one-sentence description for each of the {num_chapters} chapters. Respond with a list. Do not write anything else.

agents.description: Writes the content for each chapter.
agents.prompt_template: You are a master storyteller. Write the full content for a story titled '{title}'. The topic is '{topic}' and the mood is '{mood}'. Use the following chapter descriptions as a strict outline: {chapter_descriptions}.
